text: Achebe is a Nigerian surname of Igbo origin. Notable people with the surname include: * Alfred Achebe, 21st Obi of Onitsha * Chinua Achebe (1930–2013), Nigerian novelist, poet, professor, and critic * Nancy Achebe, Nigerian professor ==See also== *Achebe (character), a fictional character in Marvel comics Category:Igbo-language surnames
title: Achebe
